p:
We first combined the income elasticities for energy consumption from DCSW
24 with GDP per-capita projections from the Shared Socioeconomic Pathway
8, 28, 29 to construct five scenarios of baseline energy demand in 2050 without climate-change impacts, based on projections of future spatially disaggregated population
30, 31 and GDP growth for 183 countries
32 .
